plot: An anthology based (earlier moreso than later) on the novels and stories of Zane Grey. Powell was often the star as well as the host.
plot_en: An anthology based (earlier moreso than later) on the novels and stories of Zane Grey. Powell was often the star as well as the host.
plot_es: An anthology based (earlier moreso than later) on the novels and stories of Zane Grey. Powell was often the star as well as the host.
title: Zane Grey
